definition: to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent
to spread/to lay out/to apply (powder, ointment etc)/sufficient (to cover)/enough

sentences.english: STEP1: hot compress, so that the skin pores to open.
Before bed, put heating pads or warm wet towels on your knees for half an hour.
sentences.chinese: 睡前用热水袋或热的湿毛巾热敷膝盖半个小时。

sentences.english: Analgesics, hot packs, ultrasound, and massage may also provide symptomatic relief.
sentences.chinese: 止痛药，热敷法，超声及按摩亦可使症状缓解。

sentences.english: Apply hot compresses to a boil.
Projective To investigate the efficacy of cold and hot compress of bioceramics for treating reflex sympathetic dystrophy.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察生物陶瓷冷热敷治疗肩手综合征的疗效。

sentences.english: When she has leg cramps, the only thing that works is hot washrags.
sentences.chinese: 她的腿一旦抽筋，只有用毛巾热敷才能治好。

sentences.english: Conclusion Votatin emulgel inunction excelled fomentation in treating the pain from vein transfusion.
sentences.chinese: 说明涂擦扶他林乳胶剂疗效明显优于热敷治疗。

sentences.english: Hot packs and cold compresses ease symptoms.
sentences.chinese: 热敷与冷敷都可以缓解症状。

sentences.english: Parturient in test group were accepted Pringle apparatus combined massage.
sentences.chinese: 对照组按传统的局部热敷按摩后行人工挤奶。

sentences.english: Objective:To study the treatment of adhesive capsulitis with hot compress traditional chinese medicine powder.
sentences.chinese: 热敷治疗粘连性肩关节囊炎进行临床观察研究。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the clinical effectiveness of hot compress on the polarized liquid intravenous infusion-induced pain.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察热敷法对静脉滴注极化液所致疼痛的疗效。

definition: to spread/to lay out/to apply (powder, ointment etc)/sufficient (to cover)/enough
diathermia (medical treatment involving local heating of body tissues with electric current)
cupping glass/fire cupping (acupressure technique of Chinese medicine, with fired vacuum cup applied to the skin)/ventouse (vacuum method used in obstetrics)
to smear/to apply glue or ointment to a surface
